mapper.select: select to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as todate, trunc(sysdate)-to_date(regdate) as withdate from tblmember where memberseq = #{seq}
select distinct to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')as sysyear, to_char(sysdate,'mm')as sysmonth from tblmember

select distinct r.name as pastRoutineName from tblRoutineState rs inner join tblRoutine r on rs.routineseq = r.routineSeq inner join tblSuccess s on rs.routinestateseq = s.routinestateseq where rs.memberseq = #{seq} and to_char(sysdate,'yyyy') = to_char(rs.startdate,'yyyy') and to_char(sysdate,'mm') = to_char(rs.startdate,'mm') and sysdate > rs.startdate

select distinct r.name as nowRoutineName from tblRoutineState rs inner join tblRoutine r on rs.routineseq = r.routineSeq inner join tblSuccess s on rs.routinestateseq = s.routinestateseq where rs.memberseq = #{seq} and to_char(sysdate,'yyyy') = to_char(rs.startdate,'yyyy') and to_char(sysdate,'mm') = to_char(rs.startdate,'mm') and rs.startdate > sysdate

SELECT count(distinct successdate) as successday, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as todate, round(sysdate) - round(sysdate,'mm') as allday FROM VWROUTINESUCCESS vw where vw.memberseq = #{seq} and vw.successdate between trunc(sysdate,'mm') and to_char(sysdate-1,'yyyy-mm-dd') and vw.successstate ='Y'

select nvl(sum(case when vw.successstate ='N' then 1 end),0) as green, vw.successdate as greendate from vwroutinesuccess vw where vw.successdate between trunc(sysdate,'mm') and to_char(sysdate-1,'yyyy-mm-dd') and vw.memberseq = #{seq} group by vw.successdate order by vw.successdate asc
select count(*) as diarycnt from tbldiary where memberseq=1 and regdate between trunc(sysdate,'mm') and to_char(sysdate-1,'yyyy-mm-dd')
